### Test Results

<!-- Ğ’ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²ÑŒÑ‚Ğµ Ñ€ĞµĞ·ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚Ñ‹ Ñ‚ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ ÑĞºÑ€Ğ¸Ğ½ÑˆĞ¾Ñ‚Ñ‹ -->

## Pre-Submit Checklist

<!-- Ğ’ÑĞµ Ğ¿ÑƒĞ½ĞºÑ‚Ñ‹ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¶Ğ½Ñ‹ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¼ĞµÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ñ‹ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´ merge -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows the project's style guide
- [ ] Self-review of code performed
- [ ] Code is properly commented
- [ ] No TODO/FIXME left without issue reference

### Testing

- [ ] All existing tests pass (`pytest tests/`)
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Edge cases are covered

### Documentation

- [ ] Docstrings added/updated (Google style)
- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] CHANGELOG updated (if needed)
- [ ] Config options documented

### Git Hygiene

- [ ] Commits are atomic and well-described
- [ ] No merge commits (rebased on main)
- [ ] No unrelated changes included
- [ ] Branch is up to date with main

## Reviewer Checklist

<!-- Ğ”Ğ»Ñ Ñ€ĞµĞ²ÑŒÑĞµÑ€Ğ¾Ğ² -->

- [ ] Code correctness verified
- [ ] Code style is consistent
- [ ] Tests are adequate
- [ ] Documentation is sufficient
- [ ] No security issues
- [ ] No performance regressions
